presentation.fsa
Class Node

java.lang.Object
  presentation.fsa.GraphElement
      presentation.fsa.Node
All Implemented Interfaces:
PresentationElement
public class Node
extends GraphElement

The graphical representation of a state in a finite state automaton. Child glyphs are its out edges.

Author:
helen bretzke
